author: stefan2
msg: On the fsfs-format7 branch:  Switch the txn ID part of FSFS IDs from string
to ID part struct.  That concludes the ID API changes.  To keep the number
data conversions low, we attach a private txn ID struct representation to
the public API's svn_fs_txn_t, that otherwise only provides the C string
However, we keep the changes to other parts minimal and switch them over in
following patch(es).  Therefore, some of the string <-> struct conversions
added here will be removed in soon.
This is the forth larger patch in the "numerical IDs" patch series.
svn_fs_fs__id_txn_create): switch txn IDs strings to struct in signatures
(fs_fs__id_t): change txn_id member type from C string to ID part struct
(fs_txn_data_t): declare new fsap_data type for svn_fs_txn_t
create_txn_dir_pre_1_5): return C string *and* struct repesentation
svn_fs_fs__open_txn): initialize the new private TXN struct as well
svn_fs_fs__create_successor): convert to struct before passing txn ID on
rep_write_contents_close): update ID API user; convert struct -> string
(path_txn_node_rev): temporarily derive the txn_id from the full ID

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-4550: Create a stress test for CachingDirectoryFactory
